comments.comment:
Pewds: Takes a break for a month

Everyone: “Understandable”

"You don't have to buy anything. Buy your grandma some flowers, how about that." 
That is one of the most wholesome things I've heard pewds say in a while <3

Pewds: * Takes 1 month break *

Everyone: “It’s official. Pewds got kidnapped for exposing a topic he wasn’t supposed to talk about. RIP Pewds, you were one of the brave.”

Pewds: “I tried learning Japanese”
I gotta say, I really missed this guy. Glad he's doing things at his own pace, posting what he wants and just enjoying his life. It's great to have you back, Pewds.
I honestly love how casual PewDiePie is, dude just leaves cuz he feels like it and comes back with no explanation, Chad move. Welcome back man
In the time of loneliness pewds is like an old friend who makes you laugh because you both grow up together and you have the similar humour.

Why I missed Felix, 

Felix makes me happy, whenever I’m having a down day or just not feeling myself, I can log into this wild world of the internet and watch an old friend make me laugh. An old friend who doesn’t even know me but can bring a smile to my face nevertheless. When that old friend is gone, it’s just not the same. 

Felix is consistent. The king of YouTube has been enthroned not because of his high quality content, because his content quickly changes, but his consistency and genuineness is what makes us feel as though we’re friends. 

In conclusion, I missed felix, I want him to stick around. My name is Jason Jones and that is my essay.
Isn’t it crazy that most of us don’t even know him personally, but every single one of us missed him like crazy? He’s such a big part of our life’s.

"Thank you for being respectful and appreciate you guys - and you know what, you don't have to buy anything. I feel like I've been selling you guys enough stuff. Buy your grandma some flowers, how about that.". I respect Pewdiepie so much after all he's been through. He's thoughtful and a gentleman even to the people who watch him. He's still learning and growing, but it's because he always finds way to improve himself and is someone who's also been open to change. The man he is today is pretty amazing! Happy for you and Marzia, pewds!

Pewds: Learning japanese and break for a month

Everyone: "Where is pewds now?"

Really appreciate you man, glad you had a good break! I’m not as dedicated to the Pewds grind as I was, it’s expected yknow, but I still come back every now and then so I did notice you had a break and good to see you still going strong! 
I mostly appreciate you a lot for my brother, he’s always been a big fan since 2014, still is, now he’s off in the navy and he still tells me about how he loves your content and it helps him out! He’s even got the member thing and hops in streams, some months back I called and said how happy he got when Pewds read out his superchat and appreciated it :)

Glad this community is still here, still going strong, doing good stuff <3

Pewdiepie : you took everything from me
BrainCraft : I don't even know who you are XD

Pewds coming back from break: "let's start a drama with" click button for random YouTuber
Me: lighting the torch "I'm ready"

I think us as his community have grown up, that even when our main source of entertainment takes a break, we don't freak out. We know it's just life and keep on going. Congrats 19 year olds... Thinking we're getting close to 29 year olds pretty soon

Keep on doing your thing Felix. I’m glad that you’re making content when you want to and taking breaks when you want to. If you stopped making videos for good, I would be quite happy for you because I know you’re kinda at the stage in your life where you want to kick back and enjoy the simple things although that’s just what I’ve gathered from watching your vids. Lots of love to you man, and I wish you and Marzia happy days.
After 1 month of not seeing pewds I realized I missed him quite a lot

Felix: “Guess who’s back?”

Sive: “I’m no longer unemployed!”
every time i think you have achieved peak handsomeness in the thumbnail you prove me wrong

That "buy your grandma some flowers" at the end, really touched me.
My grandma and my mother will receive an extra bouquet of flowers just because of you.
Everytime he takes a break he comes back looking like a father who reads the newspaper on a recliner all day and throughout the year slowly transitions into different people until it resets
man i actually missed this dude so much, my normal life felt a bit off without his vids lmao
WE MISSED YOU PEWDS WITH ALL OF OUR HEART AND SOUL.

Just wanted to say your the reason I'm still a gamer and will be continue to be one. The friends and communities that come with it just make it even more worth it. Thank you Felix. Bro fist .

Pewds it’s honestly hard to say how much I appreciate and missed you lol

Every time you take a break I end up at a point where I’m not sure what I’m missing then you come back and something about the world feels right again.
Trying to mock a random person, then admitting that he can't do that and continuing with his usual content was the most Swedish thing I've ever seen

marzia hugging felix while hes vacuuming is the most adorable and wholesome thing ive ever seen

Not gonna lie, I unintentionally was taking a break from pewds' content- I'm glad to hear he took a break, and that people were (mostly) respective of it. This video was so wholesome, it really reminded me a lot of what I love about Felix.
Seeing all these positive comments for Pewds makes me really happy he’s got such a great fanbase.
As memeworthy as it may be, that clip of Marzia hugging Felix while he's trying to clean is very sweet. It's clear she loves him a lot
I miss you the most because your smile is enjelakant your rgbs are everywhere and the gaming and meme reviews blow the sky out
The legend has returned
When your parents give you praise, the moment you get married, the moment you have a child. Nothing compares to the happiness of seeing our little Pewdiepie come back to us.
I missed Harry Potters dad so much. End of the essay.
I missed you Pewds! I've been playing FFXIV so haven't been on YouTube much, but it's really great to see you again, I came back to watching YouTube videos right when you came back too :D

"When the world needed him the most, He was learning japanese."

-Master oogway~

Felix I missed you very much, words cannot describe the feeling of relief and solace I am feeling currently due to your prompt return. It is as if the dark veil of sadness has been lifted and happiness revealed again. The words "I'm back baby!" shook me to my core, the sheer power of those words caused me to fall down and weep. Pewdiepie your return has filled me with such overwhelming joy, your return is indicative of the golden age of glory to come, Felix, your return is a sign of good fortune to present itself to all. during your break my heart was longing for your return, your absence troubled my thoughts, sleep was unachievable, I was writhing, tossing and turning thinking maybe you would never return. But here you are, words cannot describe this feeling right now. my hands tremble while I type this. I cannot write any longer.

there's the start of the essay, can I get some help finishing it.

Aaaaaah pewds gives out such dad energy!!! Ending his vids with “I appreciate you, buy your grandma some flowers”. He seems really at peace with himself. I love this pewdiepie evolution stage can’t wait to see the next one!!!
I missed you so much pewdiepie!! I’ve been having such a hard time with life right now. Your videos always make me smile, thank you for existing and being an amazing person
I thought PewDiePie got censored after exposing the fitness celebrity lies...
when pewds said 300k instead of 300 million, underestimating his army's TRUE POWER! 10:50
I missed Pewds so much. I know he takes January off, but it always seems like the longest 31 days lol
We’ve been lost without you Felix
Just hearing your voice again is so nice. It’s truly so great that your back. It’s so calming and reassuring. I’m so glad you exist pewds
Felix telling us to buy our grandmas flowers instead of his merch is the most wholesome thing on Youtube
Awe, missed Pewds so much. Glad to have him back. Buying gma flowers now.
4:40 mans straight up made an ost

I missed Pewdiepie so much during his break. In this essay I am going to be explaining my 3 top reasons for why I missed Pewdiepie, and how much I missed him because of those aforementioned reasons. 

My first reason for missing Pewdiepie is his amazing humor. He always seems to have impeccable timing with every word he says. Skip to any point of any of his videos, and I guarantee the next word he says will be funny. This can be proven on a statistical basis using empirical evidence, by the reasoning that I say it can.

My second reason is that he knows whether math is related to science or not.

My third reason is that he is never gonna give you up,
 never gonna let you down, never gonna run around and desert you. Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye, and never gonna tell a lie and hurt you. 


To conclude this essay I would like to re-emphasize the importance of Pewdiepie's ability to say funny things at any given moment, that he know math is related to science, and that he is never gonna give us up.

I am happy to see that pewdiepie is the same generous honest sweet man he always was. After a months brake i can say I've missed his videos. At the end when he said you don't have to buy anything, buy your grandma a flower, proved once again that he is the best youtuber. It's no mistake he has the most subscribers.
Pewds acts and talks like he was meditating for a whole month. I love it.
3:44 when you realize the next drama with Mrbeast
Welcome back, Felix!
This was a he greatest notification to start my day with :)
Are you nihongo jozu yet?
I'm genuinely happy that he's back
I missed this dude. He brings a lot of entertainment and makes my day
Pewdiepie: Return Of The King
The ending just kinda hit me right in the feels.  Thanks for being you, pewds

I got a little emotional at the end. Thank you for coming back, love your content. 
I don't feel lonely when I watch your videos, so thank you for helping me through times when I feel depressed and alone. Your channel is one of my happy places on yt. I just recently realised how much joy your work brings me and how I can feel completely relaxed while watching. I always feel anxious in life and sometimes it gets really exhausting. I love that you have so many diffrent kinds of videos, so I can watch whatever fits with my mood best. 
Sometimes I get scared that you will get hurt from controversies. But I want you to always be yourself. Because thats the person I cherish so much. Even when I sometimes disagree with your opinion, or don't like every joke of yours, I still want to hear your honest thoughts. Because I think thats what should be normal. Disagreeing with each other, arguing and engaging with one another. How else will we all grow as society? 
I know it is good that you are you, and maybe one day I can feel fine with me being me.
Stay safe pewds, thank you aaand *brofist
I haven't felt nearly as much joy in the past month then right now when hearing pewds say brofist

Hey I had a dream last night that Pewds and I were in a restaurant chatting, and I kept calling him Pewdiepie, until I finally called him Felix, and he said "finally! Felix"!! ... eh... maybe I watch too much youtube...
6:46 looks like sive is not getting a promotion anytime soon

Seriously though , that brofist got me . Cool to see you back it's not about the content anymore , just spending time watchin you is nice you've become part of our lives and in this stage , you really have dad vibes , it's cool.
I realise how boring life is without pewds content whenever he takes the breaks. Makes me feel more grateful for his content lol

I was think to myself just yesterday, that I miss Pewdiepie, I've been watching Pewdiepie for 12 years, so I kinda just felt something was lacking from my life, and the very next day, BOOM, he's there!

So happy to have him back. My life been feeling empty without you. Hope you enjoyed your break

Welcome back king
Welcome back Felix, I thought youtube became boring this past month but I am really happy that you are back, the PewDiePie music thing about 5:00 in made me tear a bit too haha, it was beautiful.
I love that Felix takes breaks! His well being is more important than pleasing crying 19year Olds.
this is an heartfelt essay for how we missed pewdiepie in this hard times and finally he has returned
I didn’t realize till half way through the video I had the biggest smile on my face, it’s great to see ya back
I missed you so much. My life has not been the same ever since you left. Now that you’re back, I can finally sleep at night. Please never leave me again, jacksepticeye.

It is always so overwhelming to feel the presence of someone who truly respects you, listens to every story you will tell, and someone who will accept you even with the darkest secrets that you have. When will you realize that you are missing someone? It is when you feel so excited to see him or her again after being apart for quite some time. And maybe, when you feel uncomfortable when the thought of that person crosses your mind.

                                               This person whom I misses so much is the one I have not seen for a month or so—- “my boyfriend”. I do not know if I can still call him that way. The last thing I remember is that when we argued about the very common thing about us—my parents’ hatred for him. My parents did not like him for me. The reason is that we are still young and we have o permanent jobs yet to create our own lives in the future. At this point, we are still finishing college. But nevertheless, we still try to keep in touch through all the barriers in our relationship; although lately, the barriers become worse. Whenever he calls me at home, my parents say that I am not around eventhough I just stayed there the whole day. Because of what happened, he started being cold and uneasy. He gets mad easily, gets annoyed easily, too, although there is nothing to be mad and annoyed at. It is embarrassing but there is nothing better I could think of doing.

                                              Experiencing that situation, we decided to set the fire low between the two of us. That actually means that we will never see each other until everything goes well. So that’s it. Cool-off, whatever it is. It really confused me. Questions run in my mind like bolts of electricity. The question is like, “What the hell? Is it over?”  But those thoughts did not come out of my mouth. I just uttered “Okay”, and then we parted ways. We have no declared closure. Up to this moment I am writing this essay, I have no idea how to get on again with him. I do not really have the courage to even send a short text message to make him realize that I terribly miss him.

                                                Right now, I am making things better. I am trying to improve my grades so I will not disappoint my family. I can never really tell the future for us. But for the benefit of it, I am preparing myself when the day comes for our moment of truth. I am helping myself getting through the day although I am missing him so much. I know that when you are missing someone, you should do something on it. Act upon it. But right now, I am not sure of what I am going to do. My inspiration everyday  is the saying, ” love comes to those who wait” and “never focus on something you are not sure you are going to have.” As a whole, we should consider love as an inspiration.
Felix has ascended from react content and now basically just reacts to himself
You see, I would write an essay about how much I've missed Pewdiepie, but I'd need to know the due date so that I can procrastinate until the night of.

thx for coming back bro. I was crying, shitting my pants and throwing up from the hollow hole in my chest caused by your absence but now I am stronger than ever. My health is replenished and I grew a floor length beard in 14 minutes thanks to your return.

I have missed you so much PewDiePie! You’ve been away for a while now, and it’s been rough. But I’m confident that with some time away from the craziness of doing a daily video, you would be able to get back to doing what you do best and find new ways to entertain us all. From this day on, you will be PewDiePie, not JID or whatever your name is. From this day forward, PewDiePie is in charge of Youtube and everything that goes on there. So I hope you can all embrace PewDiePie as the new king of Youtube. You’ve been such an inspiration to me for many years now. I just want to say thank you.
I love how this guy just takes a month of whenever he feels like it. We don't own him, and hes not a content factory. I like that.

We should find a way to make a PewDiePie game that goes on a journey based on the videos he made from 2010 to now including every side character he came up with barrels, Stephano, and everything else. Make it badass but slowly take away all that he was, make it bittersweet and then give a lesson why change is good. People argue saying they miss the "old pewds" and I feel telling a wild story that ended up being in the main characters head, and in the end you have to solve problems entirely different then you did at the start, showing everyone how it's tough to accept it, but it's always there. I don't feel like you need to answer anyone anymore about that subject but I think it would be a good idea still. I'm sure if it were done right it could be like that game where you're a baby, among the sleep? Idk the name anymore I just know you played it. That used a lot of imagery and that's the idea you'd have to use for my idea.

I love your 9 year olds man 
They're so cooperative and understanding.

You've built a great community Felix , Good job !
Slim shadys back

Felix: “Guess who’s back?”

Sive: “I’m no longer unemployed!”

Ahahah... I need to order them too... On my last pair of contacts... Ty for reminding me... You really are awesome dude... You're unapologetically yourself... but with apologies because... Internet.

I wish I could handle the level of audience you can... Hell... I have a Facebook page to tend to with just over 100k people... Even that unnerves me... Always someone bitching... Nothing is ever good enough. Mad respect my dude.

I had thicker skin when I was younger tbh... I hope maybe eventually I find it again. Glad you feel better dude... People can get to you... I know.
